demo.Zhihao.Server

Class Clients

  • java.lang.Object
    • demo.Zhihao.Server.Clients

  •  class Clients
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles operation with clients.
    including system info sending, updating and etc.
    Author:
    ben

      • directConnReq

                 java.lang.String otherClient,
                 java.lang.String ip,
                 java.lang.String port)
        Sends direct connect request to a specified client.
        Parameters:
        name - the client from whom the request is sent.
        otherClient - the client to whom the request is sent.
        ip - the otherClient's IP address.
        port - the otherClient's UDP port.
